questions.question: What is the primary color of the depicted components?

Judging by the image, what material seems to constitute these objects?
Observing the small protrusions, what is their apparent function?

Considering the visible edges, what is the apparent degree of uniformity?
What is the apparent general condition of both components, observing for blemishes?

What is the apparent overall homogeneity of the color across each component?
